p: We ran MC2 on a 1/24 degree (~4 km) grid using PRISM [ 34] data for the historical period (1895–2010) and CCSM4 (National Center for Atmospheric Research) climate projections for 2011–2100 downscaled using the MACA [ 35] algorithm which performs well in capturing fire danger indices across the western US. We used the CO 2 concentrations associated with RCP 8.5 (“business as usual”). We used the same CMIP5 climate, CO 2 projections, and soil data as in [ 1].
